body.p: The Mini PDU has a top-mounted Cable Ladder Bracket next to the Cable Entry Brush Panel for attaching the Cable Ladder.
The Bracket can be attached on the left or right side of the Mini PDU, allowing the Cable Ladder to be positioned on either side.
The Bracket should be installed on the server rack side of the Mini PDU.

fig.title: Mini PDU to Cable Ladder Bracket Attachment Points

body.p: Install the Cable Ladder over the Cable Ladder Bracket as shown below.
Screws to secure the Cable Ladder to its Bracket are stored in the (4) PEM nuts of the Bracket. (Specification: Screw, 3/8”-16 X .75” lg., Hex Hd, Serrated Flange, Steel)
The Cable Ladder should also be supported by attaching the top of the Cable Ladder to the customer’s cable trough.

li.p: A licensed electrician must install the Mini PDU and connect external cables and wiring.
Installers should use Lock-Out/Tag-Out procedures and observe other precautions listed in the introductory Safety section.
Power wiring and grounding must comply with NEC and applicable local codes.
